clinic.name: Dr. Marwan Hesham
clinic.shortBioText: Lead Physiotherapist & Founder, dedicated to restoring your mobility and enhancing your quality of life.

biographyParagraphs: Dr. Marwan Hesham is Orthopedic & Sports Rehab Neurological Rehabilitation Evidence-Based Practice After graduating from the Faculty of Physical Therapy at Cairo University, he pursued advanced certifications in manual therapy and dry needlingin Egypt. His passion for evidence-based practice and patient-centered care led him to establish this clinic in 2025.

Throughout his career, Dr. Hesham has worked with a diverse range of patients, from professional athletes recovering from injuries to individuals seeking relief from chronic pain. He is a firm believer in empowering his patients through education, providing them with the knowledge and tools they need to take an active role in their recovery journey and prevent future injuries.

quote.text: True recovery isn't just about healing an injury; it's about reclaiming your life and empowering your body to perform at its best.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text: At our clinic, we believe in a holistic, patient-centered approach. Our mission is to provide personalized, evidence-based care that not only addresses symptoms but also treats the root cause of the problem. We are committed to fostering a supportive and motivating environment where every individual feels heard, respected, and confident in their path to recovery and peak well-being.

hero.headline: Regain Movement, Reclaim Your Life
hero.subheadline: Expert, personalized physiotherapy care to help you achieve your wellness goals.

servicesIntro.title: Our Specialized Services
servicesIntro.subtitle: We provide a wide range of expert physiotherapy services tailored to your individual needs.

services.title: Sports Injury Rehabilitation
services.shortDescription: Specialized care to get you back in the game safely and quickly.
services.longDescription: Targeted recovery plans designed for athletes to return to peak performance with reduced risk of re-injury.

services.title: Post-Surgical Therapy
services.shortDescription: Customized rehabilitation programs to ensure optimal recovery after surgery.
services.longDescription: Structured rehabilitation protocols to restore function and mobility following surgical procedures.

services.title: Manual & Spinal Therapy
services.shortDescription: Hands-on techniques to treat spinal and joint dysfunctions.
services.longDescription: Expert manual therapy techniques including mobilization and manipulation for spinal and joint issues.

services.title: Chronic Pain Management
services.shortDescription: A multi-faceted approach to manage and reduce long-term pain.
services.longDescription: Comprehensive strategies combining physical therapy, education, and lifestyle modifications for chronic pain relief.

services.title: Neurological Rehabilitation
services.shortDescription: Therapy to improve function for patients with neurological conditions.
services.longDescription: Specialized programs for stroke, Parkinson's, MS, and other neurological disorders to improve mobility and function.

services.title: Pediatric Physiotherapy
services.shortDescription: Gentle and effective physiotherapy for children of all ages.
services.longDescription: Age-appropriate therapy for developmental delays, injuries, and congenital conditions in children.

servicesPage.heroSubtitle: Our clinic is dedicated to providing personalized care and a holistic approach to help you on your recovery journey.
